class_description:
Implements an output stream filter for uncompressing data stored in the
 "deflate" compression format.

params.param_description: output stream to write the uncompressed data to

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new output stream with a default decompressor and buffer
 size.

params.param_description: output stream to write the uncompressed data to

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and a
 default buffer size.

params.param_description: output stream to write the uncompressed data to

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and
 buffer size.

Writes any remaining uncompressed data to the output stream and closes
 the underlying output stream.

Finishes writing uncompressed data to the output stream without closing
 the underlying stream.  Use this method when applying multiple filters in
 succession to the same output stream.

Flushes this output stream, forcing any pending buffered output bytes to be
 written.

params.param_description:
buffer containing compressed data to decompress and write to
 the output stream
starting offset of the compressed data within b
number of bytes to decompress from b

Methods.method_description: Writes an array of bytes to the uncompressed output stream.

params.param_description:
a single byte of compressed data to decompress and write to
 the output stream

Methods.method_description: Writes a byte to the uncompressed output stream.
